about_the_game:
You're a lewd scientist from INFLATION Inc.; a research corporation tasked by the government to experiment on women in the name of science! (probably)

Their goal is to unlock the secrets of FEMALE GROWTH and in order to do this, they continuously "inject" white sperm-like juices inside the women subjects in order to "inflate" them and thus simulate natural growth.

What the hell are they thinking?!?!

How to Play

INFLATION Inc. is an odd simulation game where your task is to "inflate" girls through juice experiments. You will be rewarded for doing so!

As the experiment begins, the juice bar will start filling up. To release the juice you must turn all its lights green. If the juice bar fills up completely, it will burst, ending the experiment.

Use the up and down arrow keys to select a juice bar. The selected juice bar only can turn on and turn off the lights.

To turn the lights green on corresponding juice bar,  you must hit the green meter using the spacebar.

If you fail to hit the green meter, the lights will turn off.

When you released the juice from the juice bars, the juice level will increase. Increasing the juice level, the more points and coins you will obtain. The juice level must reach 100% to make the experiment successful.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contained sexualized interactive scenes of various female characters, particularly in varying weights and sizes as part of the "inflation" gameplay mechanics, which can be regarded as sexual abuse.

As the experiment begins, the juice bar will start filling up. To release the juice you must turn all its lights green. If the juice bar fills up completely, it will burst, ending the experiment.

name: INFLATION Inc.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: You're a lewd scientist from INFLATION Inc.; a research corporation tasked by the government to experiment on women in the name of science! Their goal is to unlock the secrets of FEMALE GROWTH and you must help them achieve this goal!
